short_summary: Non-Food Kitchenware are required in order to provide kitchen and box meal services to entitled Canadian Forces members living and working at the base.
tags: Public Works and Government Services Canada
full_summary:
Tender Announcement

**Project Title** : Non-Food Kitchenware **Procurement Reference Number** : WS4352357854-Doc4467139598 **Status** : Expired **Overview** The Government of Canada is seeking proposals from qualified suppliers to provide non-food kitchenware products to the Department of National Defence (DND). This procurement is for a non-food kitchenware contract with a term of approximately 24 months, commencing on **January 18, 2024**, and ending on **January 31, 2026**. **Scope of Work** The successful bidder will be required to provide a regular supply and delivery of a wide variety of non-food kitchenware products to DND, specifically for the provision of kitchen and box meal services to eligible Canadian Forces members living and working at the base. **Key Tender Details** * **Procurement Method** : Competitive - Open Bidding * **Trade Agreements** : Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA) * **Regions of Delivery** : Ontario (excluding the National Capital Region) * **End User Entity** : Department of National Defence **Contracting Entity Details** * **Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)** * **Address** : 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada * **Contact Person** : Jeffrey Smallwood, jeffrey.smallwood@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca **Original Tender Documentation** The complete tender documents can be found on the [Buy and Sell website](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tenders?search_query=WS4352357854-Doc4467139598). It is the responsibility of the bidder to ensure they have obtained all necessary documentation to submit a complete and compliant proposal. The closing date of tender is **March 15, 2024** at 14:00 ET. **Provisional Notice of Award and Contract** The department reserves the right to award contracts without meetings with bidders, to abridge the tendering process, or to cancel the RFP at any given time.
